Summary: Oblong blue shimmering starlike, high and quick
divs: Sighting DetailsDate 9-11-2011 Time aprox. 9:00 pm Place Erwin Park Full moon that night. I was flying my rc airplane. I have blue and red leds outlining the plane so I can fly it in the dark. The plane was getting a little too far away for me to see in the dark so I brought it back closer. I was flying it almost straight up above my head . At the time I was following it from the west side of me to the east side of me. As I was watching the plane I saw a blue oblong star-like object going the same direction as my plane. It was traveling quite fast. It was about a magnitude three in brilliance. It fluctuated in brilliance. kind of shimmering. I landed the plane as quickly as I could, this took only a few seconds. When I looked up to find the blue light I could no longer see it. Just guessing at about passenger jet high or higher. Sighting approximately seven seconds. I've never seen a blue object traveling through the sky before.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
